name: Delve (itch) (timeslip1974)
description:
Made for the Miz Jam1 48 hour game jam, Delve is a fast paced twin stick shooter inspired by the 80s coin-op classic Gauntlet

a Z-Soft Release

Coded by Shaun Watters

Music by Mike Richmond

Graphics by Kenney

Additional Graphics by Tim Gilbert

Source code can be considered free and open source and is also available for download
